entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning except minus 9 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning except minus 9 over southern sections. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 12 except minus 1 over southern sections. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High minus 12 except minus 1 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
